# IConsoleBuffer.Cell method

Set a single cell in a console buffer.

```csharp
public void Cell(int x, int y, ConsoleBufferCell cell)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| x | X position to set |
| y | Y position to set |
| cell | A [`ConsoleBufferCell`](../ConsoleBufferCell.md) value to put in the cell |
